data.title: The Pepperpot Restaurant & Bar, Derby
data.meta_description: The Pepperpot is a new restaurant & bar in Derby, East Midlands. We serve breakfast, lunch & dinner, 7 days a week. The Nightingale is our dedicated corporate meeting space and private dining room. There is a large beer garden to the rear which surrounds our air condition restaurant
data.text:
2024 heralds a new dawn for one of Derby’s most iconic buildings. A new lease of life and a new dining experience for the people of this great city

Located on London Road in the newly developed Nightingale Quarter, The Pepperpot features a luxurious cafe and cocktail bar in the original building which was constructed over 130 years ago. To the rear, a stylish glass extension houses the restaurant serving breakfast, lunch & dinner seven days a week. Our chefs create exceptional dishes using the finest locally sourced produce that the region has to offer

For more information and future updates, click the icons below to follow our progress on social media

Click here to call us

The Pepperpot Gift Card

The perfect gift for you, a loved one or maybe as a reward to that someone who deserves a treat. The Pepperpot gift cards are available in denominations of £50 and can be put towards a meal or drinks.

Delivery is available throughout the UK

We are located on London Road in Derby within walking distance of the Derbion shopping centre. Whilst we do not have any on site parking, there are numerous car parking options a very short distance from our restaurant

There is an NCP car park directly opposite our building located behind the Stuart Hotel which can be accessed from Trinity Street (DE1 2RE - NCP location number 900193). Up to 4 hours at this location is just £1.95

In addition to the NCP, there are a number of on-street “pay & display” spaces on Trinity Street (Mipermit location 754547), Canal Street (Mipermit location 754530) and on London Road itself (Mipermit location 754540). Contactless payment is also available at all these locations

The Pepperpot is an inclusive and accessible restaurant with an accessible restroom, tables with additional space for easier access and a wheelchair-accessible entrance to the rear of the building on Saxelbye Avenue, DE1 2UH

If you require any additional assistance to access our restaurant or during your time with us, please do not hesitate to get in touch. A member of our team will be happy to help
